data.title: Unsloth AI - Open Source Fine-Tuning for LLMs
data.description: Open-source LLM fine-tuning for Llama 3, Phi 3.5, Mistral and more! Beginner friendly. Get faster with Unsloth.
data.content:
Unsloth AI - Open Source Fine-Tuning for LLMs
===============

[![Image 1: unsloth sticker logo](https://unsloth.ai/cgi/image/unsloth_green_sticker_cME6ryC59BlZg-VtqGN4p.png?width=128&quality=80&format=auto)](https://unsloth.ai/)[![Image 2: unsloth main Logo](https://unsloth.ai/cgi/image/unsloth_logo_no_shadow_KgfOV6keeBZnffQsKUny3.png?width=96&quality=80&format=auto)unsloth](https://unsloth.ai/)

[About](https://unsloth.ai/about)[Blog](https://unsloth.ai/blog)[Contact](https://unsloth.ai/contact)[Documentation](https://docs.unsloth.ai/)

Easily finetune & train LLMs.  
Get faster with unsloth.
========================================================

[Join our Discord](https://discord.com/invite/unsloth)[Start for free](https://github.com/unslothai/unsloth)

![Image 3: 6 cute pastel coloured sloths staring at their computer screens happy](https://unsloth.ai/cgi/image/sloths_surprise_0mhHDdv58GugL2x5o8Km8.png?width=2048&quality=80&format=auto)

We'll share important news & more!

Submit

Unsloth is trusted by teams at
==============================

![Image 4: microsoft](https://unsloth.ai/cgi/image/microsoft_logo_o6r66CblhT3tXH6iRCaP7.png?width=640&quality=80&format=auto)![Image 5: nvidia](https://unsloth.ai/cgi/image/nvidia_logo_jMPeSm-zM3f5ejGIcbkvG.png?width=640&quality=80&format=auto)![Image 6: facebook](https://unsloth.ai/cgi/image/meta_black_logo_v4cigbnOzx949fXvi_uQx.png?width=3840&quality=80&format=auto)![Image 7: nasa](https://unsloth.ai/cgi/image/1024px-NASA_Worm_logo_(black).svg_0KEakK9gxp3jmXaD5rY3Q.png?width=2048&quality=80&format=auto)![Image 8: hp](https://unsloth.ai/cgi/image/Apple_logo_black.svg_xOQEHsaLdV0DytlbKU62V.png?width=1920&quality=80&format=auto)![Image 9: vmware](https://unsloth.ai/cgi/image/Walmart_logo_6bx7FB8Zn6zIZbYJF6-4Q.png?width=3840&quality=80&format=auto)![Image 10: intel](https://unsloth.ai/cgi/image/google_black_logo_WdJKQSP5uvOwrBt25Y8UP.png?width=1920&quality=80&format=auto)![Image 11: nsw government](https://unsloth.ai/cgi/image/canva_logo_CYgfEmjNCij89VUjorZRY.png?width=3840&quality=80&format=auto)![Image 12: university of washington](https://unsloth.ai/cgi/image/hugging-face_black_logo_b2Rm0toApctdUSqd69gIO.png?width=3840&quality=80&format=auto)![Image 13: scipy](https://unsloth.ai/cgi/image/linkedin_logo_1Ueuje8vJhoqyJ96qk1Pb.png?width=3840&quality=80&format=auto)![Image 14: pytorch](https://unsloth.ai/cgi/image/pytorch_logo_IFmh3pX8StLrHAZ1e3hug.png?width=640&quality=80&format=auto)![Image 15: unsw](https://unsloth.ai/cgi/image/deloitte_logo_cBS0YxAL5I_USoIlB8owv.png?width=3840&quality=80&format=auto)

Latest News
===========

[![Image 16: Llama 3.2 Meta Unsloth](https://unsloth.ai/cgi/image/reasoning_nocolor_b1f-oiMLet4vo3v6QFj0N.png?width=3840&quality=80&format=auto)](https://unsloth.ai/blog/r1-reasoning)

[Train your own Reasoning Model](https://unsloth.ai/blog/r1-reasoning)Feb 5, 2025

[![Image 17: Llama 3.2 Meta Unsloth](https://unsloth.ai/cgi/image/deepseek_black_white_vr5x7YOB_BpFtgP8j_dx-.png?width=3840&quality=80&format=auto)](https://unsloth.ai/blog/deepseekr1-dynamic)

[Run 1.58-bit Dynamic DeepSeek-R1](https://unsloth.ai/blog/deepseekr1-dynamic)Jan 27, 2025

[![Image 18: Llama 3.2 Meta Unsloth](https://unsloth.ai/cgi/image/phi4_1200_b3jH5bVTAataEsAOVUALU.png?width=3840&quality=80&format=auto)](https://unsloth.ai/blog/phi4)

[Phi-4 Finetuning + Bug Fixes](https://unsloth.ai/blog/phi4)Jan 10, 2025

[View more news](https://unsloth.ai/blog)

Train your own custom ChatGPT in 24 hrs, not 30 days.
=====================================================

30x faster than FA2 + 30% accuracy

90% less memory usage than FA2

LoRA and QLoRA fine-tuning support

How are we faster?
==================

By manually deriving all compute heavy maths steps and handwriting GPU kernels, unsloth can magically make training faster without any hardware changes.

[Find out more](https://unsloth.ai/introducing)

![Image 19: cute cat happy being surrounded by 3d code, objects and geometric blocks](https://unsloth.ai/cgi/image/_fa59568a-b015-47b6-ae72-4cc30b58e0c7_xm6uk6zEk_VJZhtIJjHVM.jpg?width=2048&quality=80&format=auto)

![Image 20: cute sloth on top of a 3d graphics card](https://unsloth.ai/cgi/image/_1d5a5685-2d88-44ca-b50f-ba432cd646ef_9CGCY8lvw4D9JkOdueqsk.jpeg?width=2048&quality=80&format=auto)

1 GPU or 100 GPUs
=================

10x faster on a single GPU and up to 32x faster on multiple GPU systems compared to Flash Attention 2 (FA2).  
We support NVIDIA GPUs from Tesla T4 to H100, and weâ€™re portable to AMD and Intel GPUs.

[Contact us](https://unsloth.ai/contact)[Find out more](https://unsloth.ai/introducing)

Donâ€™t believe us?
=================

Why not try our fully free open source version? Finetune 2X faster on a single NVIDIA GPU for free on Google Colab or Kaggle Notebooks.

[Get access now](https://unsloth.ai/)

![Image 21](https://unsloth.ai/cgi/image/_7ffe0402-d1f0-4d66-aa5f-29254bc56d06_OJ8kyMzfY41BcwNYohY2a.jpg?width=2048&quality=80&format=auto)

The details
===========

============================================

================================

Faster hardware is getting harder to make. Armed with our maths and coding expertise, we specialize in optimizing AI and ML workloads.

Pricing
=======

Free

Freeware of our standard version of unsloth

[Get started](https://github.com/unslothai/unsloth)

*   Open-source
*   Supports Mistral, Gemma
*   Supports LLama 1, 2, 3
*   Single GPU support
*   Supports 4 bit, 16 bit LoRA


================================================================================================================================

unsloth Pro

Unlock multi GPU support + 2.5x faster training + 20% less VRAM

[Contact us](https://unsloth.ai/contact)

*   2.5x number of GPUs faster than FA2
*   20% less memory than OSS
*   Multi GPU support
*   Up to 8 GPUS support
*   For any usecase


================================================================================================================================

unsloth Enterprise

Unlock 30x faster training + multi-node support + 30% accuracy

[Contact us](https://unsloth.ai/contact)

*   32x number of GPUs faster than FA2
*   up to +30% accuracy
*   5x faster inference
*   Supports full training
*   All Pro plan features
*   Multi-node support
*   Customer support


================================================================================================================================
